title: How to Make Pumpkin S'more Dip

steps.headline: Make the dip filling.
steps.description: Use a stand mixer to beat the pumpkin, cream cheese, brown sugar, vanilla, and pumpkin pie spice together in a large bowl.

steps.headline: Add the filling to a 9-inch (23 cm) pie pan.
steps.description: Use a rubber spatula to smooth it out evenly.

steps.headline: Add the marshmallows.
steps.description: Spread the marshmallows on top of the filling in a single layer.

steps.headline: Bake the dip for 12 to 15 minutes.
Drizzle the melted chocolate on top.
steps.description: Create zig-zag lines for a nicer presentation.

steps.headline: Serve the dip with graham crackers on a serving platter.

text: Preheat the oven at 350ºF (180ºC).  Make the dip filling. Use a stand mixer to beat the pumpkin, cream cheese, brown sugar, vanilla, and pumpkin pie spice together in a large bowl. Add the filling to a 9-inch (23 cm) pie pan. Use a rubber spatula to smooth it out evenly. Add the marshmallows. Spread the marshmallows on top of the filling in a single layer. Bake the dip for 12 to 15 minutes.  Drizzle the melted chocolate on top. Create zig-zag lines for a nicer presentation. Serve the dip with graham crackers on a serving platter.
sentences: Use a stand mixer to beat the pumpkin, cream cheese, brown sugar, vanilla, and pumpkin pie spice together in a large bowl.
Add the filling to a 9-inch (23 cm) pie pan.
Use a rubber spatula to smooth it out evenly.
Spread the marshmallows on top of the filling in a single layer.
Bake the dip for 12 to 15 minutes.
Drizzle the melted chocolate on top.
Create zig-zag lines for a nicer presentation.
Serve the dip with graham crackers on a serving platter.
